participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Emma is creative, adventurous, and has a passion for animals. She's often seen daydreaming and enjoys exploring new ideas.
participant_1.background: i've brown curly hair. my bedroom is purple and lime green. i am a vegan. i like riding horses. i'll graduate from high school in two years.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is nostalgic, energetic, and has a great sense of rhythm. He loves sharing stories from his childhood and enjoys connecting with others through music.
participant_2.background: i take dance lessons once a week. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop. my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite.
